moves.1. d4: THIS was a fun game!!! I LOVED this game! The other player and I chatted during the game; I wish you could see the comments!
So far, this is a normal game, by my standards.
moves.6. g4 Be4 7. f3 Bg6 8. Bg2 Bd6 9. Nge2 N: THAT was the main mistake they made. It was queen suicide to throw the queen in an area made to crush/restrict the knight. Tho', it DID get my attention off of the Knight for a while... :P
moves.12. Na4 Qb5 13. Nec3 Bg3+ 14. Kd2 Qc4 15: THAT was the SECOND bad move this person made... Now she (I think) lost a knight AND the queen!
moves.17. Qxc2 e5:
That confused me to no end...
Her too, from the comments she made later... <:)
moves.18. Bxc4 dxc4 19. Nc5 Rad8 20. Ne2 Nd7 2: The first open file of the game, and it's for Black!
moves.31. Qe7: Here I got greedy. Watch as it costs me my queen in the next few turns.
moves.31... Rf7 32. Qe8+ Rf8: If my queen's a gonner anyways...
moves.33. Qe6+ Rxe6 34. Nxe6:
I'll make 'er pay through the nose for it! AND get a good position, too.

When she saw this, she realized that winning was out of the question for her (I had both rooks, both knights, a bishop and the same number of pawns) and resigned. All in all, It was a REALLY fun game! I enjoyed it a lot and would enjoy playing her again, anytime!!!
